mapper.select: select aa.dateRefence AS dateRefence, isnull(bb.count_huangtiao,0) as huangTiaoCount, isnull(cc.失败客户数,0) as failCount, isnull(dd.Effective_number,0) AS effectiveCount, isnull(ee.信息数,0) AS infoCount from (select CONVERT(date,DATEADD(D,number,#{beginData}),23) as dateRefence from [master].[dbo].[spt_values] where type='p') aa LEFT JOIN [ZXS].[dbo].[ZXS_Huangtiao] bb ON aa.dateRefence=bb.[date] AND bb.zixunshi_no=#{staffCode} LEFT JOIN ZXS..ZXS_Dashibai cc ON aa.dateRefence=cc.日期 and cc.咨询师人员编码=#{staffCode} left join [DW].[dbo].[CSC_Effective_number] dd on aa.dateRefence=dd.DATE and dd.zixunshi_no=#{staffCode} left join (SELECT 姓名 [zixunshi], 人员编码 [zixunshi_no],日期,SUM(分配信息数)[信息数] FROM [XX].[dbo].[DistributionRecords] GROUP BY [姓名],[人员编码],日期) ee on aa.dateRefence=ee.日期 and ee.zixunshi_no=#{staffCode} WHERE aa.dateRefence<=#{endData} order by aa.dateRefence

select A.d_date as smallDate, COUNT(b.zixunshi_no) as samllCount from( SELECT convert(date,DATEADD(D,number,#{beginData}),23) d_date FROM [master].[dbo].[spt_values] aa where type='p' and number<=DATEDIFF(D,#{beginData},#{endData}))a LEFT JOIN [DW].[dbo].[CSC_SmallQualityService] b on a.d_date=CONVERT(DATE,b.createdon_time, 23) and b.zixunshi_no=#{staffCode} group by A.d_date ORDER BY A.d_date

SELECT type_month as month, ISNULL(type_count, 0) as count from ZXS_CZDA.dbo.ZXS_Multidimensional_analysis_month WHERE name_no=#{staffCode} and sta_type=#{staType} AND type_month>=#{beginMonth} and type_month<=#{endMonth}
SELECT DISTINCT sta_type as staffType from ZXS_CZDA.dbo.ZXS_Multidimensional_analysis_month WHERE name_no=#{staffCode} AND type_month>=#{beginMonth} and type_month<=#{endMonth}
